actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to study certain lands within the Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana for potential designation as wilderness, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to study and report to the President findings concerning the suitability of designating specified areas of the Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana as a wilderness area.

titles.title: A bill to study certain lands within the Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana for potential designation as wilderness, and for other purposes.
